# [Interview #1150: Librarypalooza, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1150#19)

#### Paladin Brewer

Is it more difficult to Worldhop if you are carrying things with you, such as allomantic metals?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, it is not.
